name: UBX-RXM-RAWX
description:
This message contains the information needed to be able to generate a RINEX 3 multi-GNSS observation file (see ftp://ftp.igs.org/pub/data/format/).
This message contains pseudorange, Doppler, carrier phase, phase lock and signal quality information for GNSS satellites once signals have been synchronized. This message supports all active GNSS.
The only difference between this version of the message and the previous version (UBX-RXM-RAWX-DATA0) is the addition of the version field.

fields.name: rcvTow
fields.description:
Measurement time of week in receiver local time approximately aligned to the GPS time system.
The receiver local time of week, week number and leap second information can be used to translate the time to other time systems. More information about the difference in time systems can be found in the RINEX 3 format documentation. For a receiver operating in GLONASS only mode, UTC time can be determined by subtracting the leaps field from GPS time regardless of whether the GPS leap seconds are valid.

fields.name: week
fields.description: GPS week number in receiver local time.

fields.name: leaps
fields.description: GPS leap seconds (GPS-UTC). This field represents the receiver's best knowledge of the leap seconds offset. A flag is given in the recStat bitfield to indicate if the leap seconds are known.

bitfields.name: clkReset
bitfields.description: Clock reset applied. Typically the receiver clock is changed in increments of integer milliseconds.

fields.name: prMes
fields.description: Pseudorange measurement [m]. GLONASS inter frequency channel delays are compensated with an internal calibration table.

fields.name: cpMes
fields.description: Carrier phase measurement [cycles]. The carrier phase initial ambiguity is initialized using an approximate value to make the magnitude of the phase close to the pseudorange measurement. Clock resets are applied to both phase and code measurements in accordance with the RINEX specification.

fields.name: doMes
fields.description: Doppler measurement (positive sign for approaching satellites) [Hz]

fields.name: gnssId
fields.description: GNSS identifier (see Satellite Numbering for a list of identifiers)

fields.name: sigId
fields.description: New style signal identifier (see Signal Identifiers).(not supported for protocol versions less than 27.00)

fields.name: freqId
fields.description: Only used for GLONASS: This is the frequency slot + 7 (range from 0 to 13)

fields.name: cpStdev
fields.description: Estimated carrier phase measurement standard deviation (note a raw value of 0x0F indicates the value is invalid)
